description: This Java class, JDParserService, is part of a backend service for processing job descriptions. It extracts text from job description files, identifies skills and keywords, and saves the processed data to a repository.

classes.name: JDParserService
classes.description: Service class responsible for parsing job description files, extracting skills and keywords, and persisting the data.

methods.name: parseAndPersist
methods.description: Parses a file at a given path, extracts text, identifies skills and keywords, guesses the job title, and saves the data as a JobDescription entity.

methods.name: persistFromRawText
methods.description: Creates and saves a JobDescription entity based on raw text input and a specified title.

methods.name: extractText
methods.description: Uses Apache Tika to parse and extract text content from a file located at the given path.

methods.name: extractSkills
methods.description: Identifies presence of known skills in the text by searching for known skill keywords.

methods.name: extractKeywords
methods.description: Tokenizes text and identifies the most frequent keywords, filtering out short tokens and numbers.

methods.name: guessTitle
methods.description: Attempts to determine a job title from the text by scanning for lines containing common roles like 'engineer', 'developer', or 'manager'.
